citations.narrative:
The facility did not have acquisition and disposition records for one Common marmoset. Acquisition and disposition
records, including animals transported by the dealer, are necessary to accurately track animals being used in regulated
activities and/or maintained on the premises. The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of
acquisition/disposition of all animals that fully and correctly disclose the required information.
CORRECT BY May 31, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility did not have acquisition and disposition records for one Common marmoset. Acquisition and disposition 
records, including animals transported by the dealer, are necessary to accurately track animals being used in regulated 
activities and/or maintained on the premises. The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records of 
acquisition/disposition of all animals that fully and correctly disclose the required information. 
CORRECT BY May 31, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
